title: Scott Fish Joins the Show! 0.5 PPR Mock Draft and SFBX Preview (06/29 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
The most charitable man in the industry joins us today! Scott Fish is here to talk about his Fantasy charity, the Scott Fish Bowl and a 0.5 PPR mock draft. Oh, and he weighs in on Cam Newton (6:55) as Heath also tells us where he has Cam in his rankings ... We discuss the most interesting picks of a 0.5 PPR mock draft we completed recently. Josh Jacobs and Derrick Henry were the 7th and 8th picks, respectively (16:00). Is that justified given their lack of catches? James Conner went 33rd (23:15) and Keenan Allen was the 24th WR selected (26:35). Find out who went ahead of Allen. Finally, Mark Ingram fell to the 6th round (28:50). What gives!? The guys don't seem to think it's unreasonable ... We review Scott's team (40:00) including whether or not he made a mistake with his RB depth. Then Scott discusses the Scott Fish Bowl (51:00) and what you need to know about the scoring system ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
'Fantasy Football Today' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, and wherever else you listen to podcasts.
Follow the new FFT Twitch channel: https://www.twitch.tv/FFToday
Follow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @YardsPerGretch, @BenSchragg
Watch FFT on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCviK78rIWXhZdFzJ1Woi7Fg/videos
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/FantasyFootballToday/
Sign up for the FFT newsletter https://www.cbssports.com/newsletter
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/

itunes:title: Scott Fish Joins the Show! 0.5 PPR Mock Draft and SFBX Preview (06/29 Fantasy Football Podcast)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Scott Fish joins the show to talk about the Scott Fish Bowl, the 0.5 PPR mock draft we recently completed and his Fantasy charity. Also: More Cam Newton thoughts and some Justin Jefferson love.
